KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: All of required courses
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must have successfully completed all courses from <courses>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: N of required courses
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must have successfully completed a minimum of <n> courses from <courses>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: None of required courses
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must not have successfully completed any courses from <courses>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Maximum credit from courses
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must successfully complete no more than <n> credits from <courses>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Completed N credits from courses
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must have successfully completed a minimum of <n> credits from <courses>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Completed none credits from courses
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must not have successfully completed any credits from <courses>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Enrolled in N of required courses
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must be concurrently enrolled in a minimum of <n> courses from <courses>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Minimum overall GPA
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must have earned a minimum GPA of <GPA> in <courses>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Grade in required courses
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must not have earned a grade of <gradeType> <grade> or higher in <courses>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Grade in required courses
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must have earned a minimum grade of <gradeType> <grade> in <courses>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Minimum grade in required courses
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must successfully complete a minimum of <n> courses from <courses> with a minimum grade of <gradeType> <grade>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Course repeatable for maximum credit
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: May be repeated for a maximum of <n> credits

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Minimum credit completion in organization/department
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must have successfully completed a minimum of <n> credits from courses in the <org>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Program admission at campus
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must be admitted to any program offered at the course campus location

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Instructor permission required
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Permission of <instructor> required

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Organization permisison required
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Permission of <administering org> required

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Program admission for courses in duration
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Students admitted to <program> may take no more than <n> courses in the <org> in <duration> <durationType>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Program admission restriction
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must not have been admitted to the <program> program

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Program admission course restriction in duration
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Students not admitted to <program> may take no more than <n> courses in the <org> in <duration> <durationType>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Maximum score on test
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must have achieved a score no higher than <score> on <test>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Minimum score on test
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must have achieved a minimum score of <score> on <tests>

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: All of required courses
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must be enrolled in all of the following courses

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: One of required courses
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must be enrolled in one of the following courses

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Earning n credits
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must be admitted to program prior to earning <n> credits

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Candidate status within duration after program entry
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must attain candidate status within <n> <duration> after program entry term

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Not exceed n duration without completing program
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must not exceed <n> <duration> without completing program

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Complete program within duration after program entry
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must complete program within <n> <durations> after program entry term

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Earned more than n credits
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must not have earned more than <n> credits

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Earned minimum n credits
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must have earned a minimum of <n> total credits

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: All of required programs
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must have successfully completed all of <programs> programs

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Minimum of n programs from programs
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must have successfully completed a minimum of <n> programs from <programs> programs

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Minimum courses from programs
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must have successfully completed a minimum of <n> courses from <programs> programs

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: Not completed any programs
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Must not have successfully completed any of <programs> programs

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: None of required programs
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Enrollment is not available to students in the following programs

KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.NAME: One of required programs
KSST_REQ_COM_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Enrollment is limited to students in the following programs
